definition: old variant of 曆|历[li4]/old variant of 歷|历[li4]
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: Qu Yuan is a historical play written by Guo Moruo.
sentences.chinese: 《屈原》是郭沫若写的一部历史剧。

sentences.english: Henry IV is the most outstanding work among Shakespeare's historicals.
sentences.chinese: 《亨利四世》是莎士比亚历史剧中最杰出的作品。
这是莎士比亚的历史剧。

sentences.english: The historical drama eventually clocked in at three and a half hours.
sentences.chinese: 这部历史剧最终的时长达三个半小时。
简曾为一出历史剧设计服装。

sentences.english: I like movies too; comedies and historical drama are my favorites.
sentences.chinese: 我也看电影，一些喜剧片和历史剧是我的喜爱。

sentences.english: Prince Henry was a character in Shakspeare's historical drama Henry IV.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔王子是莎士比亚历史剧《亨利四世》中的主人公。

definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
